creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Howard P. Clarke
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Cloisonne bowl; gold rim and base, blue interior; exterior, blue ground with green branch and flower patterns in background, two green, red, blue and yellow dragons in foreground

title: Bowl
